name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Porto - Import your Tweets to Bluesky

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to import all your tweets to bluesky at a click of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Porto is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that lets you transfer all your Twitter/X tweets to Bluesky with just one click. Say goodbye to manual exporting or copyingâ€”Porto handles everything, ensuring your content migrates smoothly and securely. Whether you're transitioning to Bluesky or simply backing up your tweets, Porto makes the process fast and hassle-free. Perfect for content creators, social media managers, or anyone looking to maintain their presence across multiple platforms.
How to Use

    Download your archive data from Twitter/X.
    Extract the zip file.
    Upload the extracted files into the extension.
    Proceed, minimize the window, and let the magic happen!

If you love what we've built and want us to continue creating awesome tools, please consider supporting us by donating.
